summary: Note that currently all the regions must use the domain "api
description: Note that currently all the regions must use the domain "api.lazada.com" to invoke this API. This API is used to access DataMoat Account Security Service, which is required in the process of accessing sensitive data.

query.name: time
query.description: UNIX formatted timestamps in milliseconds and specifies the desired time as milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC

query.name: appName
query.description: The application name you registered on LAZOP console when you applied for an app category

query.name: userId
query.description: The account which the Lazada Seller uses to login to your app (Note: the format of the account depends on the setup of your app)

query.name: tid
query.description: Unique information which Lazada can identify who the seller is e.g. seller's main email address linked to the Lazada seller's seller account, short code

query.name: userIp
query.description: The Lazada seller's source IP address for this access request

query.name: ati
query.description: The javascript code from Device Fingeprint will automatically generate an ati parameter value in the cookie

query.name: loginResult
query.description: Set it to success if login is successful and fail if login is unsuccessful

query.name: loginMessage
query.description: Other information such as reasons for the failed attempts

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/datamoat/login')
request.add_api_parameter("time", "1519714281000")
request.add_api_parameter("appName", "yourAppName")
request.add_api_parameter("userId", "peter")
request.add_api_parameter("tid", "peter@seller.com")
request.add_api_parameter("userIp", "212.68.135.22")
request.add_api_parameter("ati", "202cb962ac59075b964b07152d234b70")
request.add_api_parameter("loginResult", "fail")
request.add_api_parameter("loginMessage", "password is not corret")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/datamoat/login')
request.add_api_param('time', '1519714281000')
request.add_api_param('appName', 'yourAppName')
request.add_api_param('userId', 'peter')
request.add_api_param('tid', 'peter@seller.com')
request.add_api_param('userIp', '212.68.135.22')
request.add_api_param('ati', '202cb962ac59075b964b07152d234b70')
request.add_api_param('loginResult', 'fail')
request.add_api_param('loginMessage', 'password is not corret')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.message: The request has failed due to a temporary failure of RPC server
error_codes.description: API request region can only select MY
